title: Learning Design-Based Teaching Methods Workshop for Prospective Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Customized training program for in-service secondary science teachers, aiming to strengthen curriculum redesign and innovative instructional design capabilities

learning_goals: Participants can develop one or more science lesson design plans by applying the Learning by Design framework.
Participants can propose an improved instructional model incorporating peer feedback through collaborative learning.
Participants can analyze problems in existing teaching methods and suggest alternative strategies through reflective practice.
Participants can create a science lesson evaluation rubric reflecting 21st-century competencies (creativity, critical thinking, etc.).

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (Google Workspace, Miro, etc.)
Model lesson videos for case analysis

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
